title: Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino and Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi say Ronnie Ortiz-Magro has IGNORED them
text:
Just days after Ronnie Ortiz-Magro was arrested for reportedly striking his on-and-off girlfriend Jen Harley while she held their daughter, their Jersey Shore co-stars are speaking out.

Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino joined Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi on her podcast It's Happening with Snooki & Joey, where they both said Ortiz-Magro is 'ignoring' them.

They also spoke out about Harley, bashing her for posting photos of her 'injuries' on social media.

Speaking out: Just days after Ronnie Ortiz-Magro was arrested for reportedly striking his on-and-off girlfriend Jen Harley while she held their daughter, their Jersey Shore co-stars are speaking out

Snooki and Situation: Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino joined Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi on her podcast It's Happening with Snooki & Joey , where they both said Ortiz-Magro is 'ignoring' them

When asked about Ronnie's situation, Sorrentino said, 'Listen, I pray for him, Jen, the baby, I pray for his future.'

Polizzi added that Jen, 'explained what happened last week on the podcast, because it happened last week' with Sorrentino adding, 'he's not answering texts.'

'He's not answering any of us,' Polizzi added, with Sorrentino adding, 'He's not answering you?'

Ronnie's situation: When asked about Ronnie's situation, Sorrentino said, 'Listen, I pray for him, Jen, the baby, I pray for his future'

Sorrentino added, 'I've been texting him for days. At first I was a bit stern, I was like, "Wake the f**k up and call me."'

Polizzi agreed and said, 'Yeah, we're worried,' with Sorrentino adding, 'He didn't answer back and I went with a little softer approach, like, "Bro, I'm here for you."'

Polizzi added that she sent him 'emoji hugs' and told him that, 'We're here for you, and I didn't hear anything.'

Stern: Sorrentino added, 'I've been texting him for days. At first I was a bit stern, I was like, "Wake the f**k up and call me"'

Polizzi added that she did hear from 'SA,' referring to Jersey Shore creator SallyAnn Salsano, who told her that, 'she has been in contact with him and she goes, "Is he talking to any of you?" And we go, "No."'

Sorrentino said that the producers want him to go to Las Vegas, where Ortiz-Magro lives, and film, but Polizzi added, 'I don't think he's a part of it, I think it's Pauly and Vinny's show.'

The talk then turned to Jen, who was seen with injuries in photos taken of her in a tank top and shorts.

Ripping Jen: Polizzi tore into her, speculating she went out showing off her bruises for the sole reason of being photographed

Polizzi tore into her, speculating she went out showing off her bruises for the sole reason of being photographed.

'My thing is with Jen in this photo. 'Cause there’s a photo released. She’s out to lunch with Ariana. She’s wearing a tank top and shorts, and she has bruises everywhere. I feel like she went out intentionally to get a photo of her,' Polizzi said, which Sorrentino agreed with.

'You don’t have to be wearing a tank top, showing your bruises and the bruise on your leg. She’s wearing booty shorts to show it off,' Polizzi added.

'Like, 'Girl, you can go out with your daughter and have lunch but cover those up so it’s not a thing.' She wants it to be a thing,' she added.

Sorrentino capped off the discussion by saying, 'When I see him, I'm gonna let him know I support him, and if he wants any advice, I'll give it.'
